thread.title: Alabama beat reporters: Best/worst surprises this season (so far...)
thread.title_full: Alabama beat reporters: Best/worst surprises this season (so far...)

author: Vasha Hunt | vhunt@al.com
title: Alabama beat reporters: Best/worst surprises this season (so far...)
text:
Comments 
Alabama football beat reporters Michael Casagrande and John Talty give their picks for the best and worst surprises of the 2015 season thus far in the video above. 
Among the good surprises is Richard Mullaney - see photos of the newcomer (he transferred from Oregon State after graduating to use his final year of eligibility at Alabama) in the gallery below. 
Also, Talty's article from earlier this week on Kenyan Drake can be found here .
